name: Aliyah-tips
tagline: Aliyah Tips for people who are planning their move to Israel
body:
#Tips from Olim

I had the idea to capture some of the tips we pass along to people who are following us to Israel in a guide of sorts so we can point them to this collection of tips as it evolves. This is, more or less, a precursor for that guide.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
